verses.verse: And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did <WH6213> <WH8800> evil <WH7451> again <WH3254> <WH8686> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>; and the YY <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> them into the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>.

And there was a certain <WH259> man <WH376> of Zorah <WH6881>, of the family <WH4940> of the Danites <WH1839>, whose name <WH8034> was Manoach <WH4495>; and his wife <WH802> was barren <WH6135>, and bare <WH3205> <WH8804> not.

And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> unto the woman <WH802>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Behold now, thou art barren <WH6135>, and bearest <WH3205> <WH8804> not: but thou shalt conceive <WH2029> <WH8804>, and bear <WH3205> <WH8804> a son <WH1121>.
Now therefore beware <WH8104> <WH8734>, I pray thee, and drink <WH8354> <WH8799> not wine <WH3196> nor strong drink <WH7941>, and eat <WH398> <WH8799> not any unclean <WH2931> thing:

For, lo, thou shalt conceive <WH2030>, and bear <WH3205> <WH8802> a son <WH1121>; and no razor <WH4177> shall come <WH5927> <WH8799> on his head <WH7218>: for the child <WH5288> shall be a Nazarite <WH5139> unto 'Elohim <WH430> from the womb <WH990>: and he shall begin <WH2490> <WH8686> to deliver <WH3467> <WH8687> Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>.

Then the woman <WH802> came <WH935> <WH8799> and told <WH559> <WH8799> her husband <WH376>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, A man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> came <WH935> <WH8804> unto me, and his countenance <WH4758> was like the countenance <WH4758> of an angel <WH4397> of 'Elohim <WH430>, very <WH3966> terrible <WH3372> <WH8737>: but I asked <WH7592> <WH8804> him not whence he was, neither told <WH5046> <WH8689> he me his name <WH8034>:

But he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Behold, thou shalt conceive <WH2030>, and bear <WH3205> <WH8802> a son <WH1121>; and now drink <WH7941> no wine <WH3196> nor strong drink <WH8354> <WH8799>, neither eat <WH398> <WH8799> any unclean <WH2932> thing: for the child <WH5288> shall be a Nazarite <WH5139> to 'Elohim <WH430> from the womb <WH990> to the day <WH3117> of his death <WH4194>.

Then Manoach <WH4495> intreated <WH6279> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O <WH994> my YY <WH136>, let <WH4994> the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> which thou didst send <WH7971> <WH8804> come again <WH935> <WH8799> unto us, and teach <WH3384> <WH8686> us what we shall do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto the child <WH5288> that shall be born <WH3205> <WH8795>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> hearkened <WH8085> <WH8799> to the voice <WH6963> of Manoach <WH4495>; and the angel <WH4397> of 'Elohim <WH430> came again <WH935> <WH8799> unto the woman <WH802> as she sat <WH3427> <WH8802> in the field <WH7704>: but Manoach <WH4495> her husband <WH376> was not with her.

And the woman <WH802> made haste <WH4116> <WH8762>, and ran <WH7323> <WH8799>, and shewed <WH5046> <WH8686> her husband <WH376>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Behold, the man <WH376> hath appeared <WH7200> <WH8738> unto me, that came <WH935> <WH8804> unto me the other day <WH3117>.

And Manoach <WH4495> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> after <WH310> his wife <WH802>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> to the man <WH376>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Art thou the man <WH376> that spakest <WH1696> <WH8765> unto the woman <WH802>? And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I am.
And Manoach <WH4495> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Now let thy words <WH1697> come to pass <WH935> <WH8799>. How shall we order <WH4941> the child <WH5288>, and how shall we do <WH4639> unto him?
And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Manoach <WH4495>, Of all that I said <WH559> <WH8804> unto the woman <WH802> let her beware <WH8104> <WH8735>.

She may not eat <WH398> <WH8799> of any thing that cometh <WH3318> <WH8799> of the vine <WH1612>, neither let her drink <WH8354> <WH8799> wine <WH3196> or strong drink <WH7941>, nor eat <WH398> <WH8799> any unclean <WH2932> thing: all that I commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> her let her observe <WH8104> <WH8799>.

And Manoach <WH4495> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068>, I pray thee, let us detain <WH6113> <WH8799> thee, until we shall have made ready <WH6213> <WH8799> a kid <WH1423> <WH5795> for <WH6440> thee.

And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Manoach <WH4495>, Though thou detain <WH6113> <WH8799> me, I will not eat <WH398> <WH8799> of thy bread <WH3899>: and if <WH518> thou wilt offer <WH6213> <WH8799> a burnt offering <WH5930>, thou must offer <WH5927> <WH8686> it unto the YY <WH3068>. For Manoach <WH4495> knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not that he was an angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068>.

And Manoach <WH4495> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068>, What is thy name <WH8034>, that when thy sayings <WH1697> come to pass <WH935> <WH8799> we may do thee honour <WH3513> <WH8765> ?
And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Why askest <WH7592> <WH8799> thou thus after my name <WH8034>, seeing it is secret <WH6383> <WH8675> <WH6383> ?

So Manoach <WH4495> took <WH3947> <WH8799> a kid <WH1423> <WH5795> with a meat offering <WH4503>, and offered <WH5927> <WH8799> it upon a rock <WH6697> unto the YY <WH3068>: and the angel did <WH6213> <WH8800> wondrously <WH6381> <WH8688>; and Manoach <WH4495> and his wife <WH802> looked on <WH7200> <WH8802>.

For it came to pass, when the flame <WH3851> went up <WH5927> <WH8800> toward heaven <WH8064> from off the altar <WH4196>, that the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> ascended <WH5927> <WH8799> in the flame <WH3851> of the altar <WH4196>. And Manoach <WH4495> and his wife <WH802> looked on <WH7200> <WH8802> it, and fell on <WH5307> <WH8799> their faces <WH6440> to the ground <WH776>.

But the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> did no more <WH3254> <WH8804> appear <WH7200> <WH8736> to Manoach <WH4495> and to his wife <WH802>. Then Manoach <WH4495> knew <WH3045> <WH8804> that he was an angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068>.
And Manoach <WH4495> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his wife <WH802>, We shall surely <WH4191> <WH8800> die <WH4191> <WH8799>, because we have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> 'Elohim <WH430>.

But his wife <WH802> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, If <WH3863> the YY <WH3068> were pleased <WH2654> <WH8804> to kill <WH4191> <WH8687> us, he would not have received <WH3947> <WH8804> a burnt offering <WH5930> and a meat offering <WH4503> at our hands <WH3027>, neither would he have shewed <WH7200> <WH8689> us all these things, nor would as at this time <WH6256> have told <WH8085> <WH8689> us such things as these <WH2063>.

And the woman <WH802> bare <WH3205> <WH8799> a son <WH1121>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> SHimshon <WH8123>: and the child <WH5288> grew <WH1431> <WH8799>, and the YY <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> him.
And the Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH3068> began <WH2490> <WH8686> to move him at times <WH6470> <WH8800> in the camp <WH4264> of Dan <WH1835> between Zorah <WH6881> and Eshtaol <WH847>.
